title: Made an Ahri Montage #3, please look and give feedback, appreciated!!!

embed.description: ♡SEZIYA AHRI MONTAGE♡ LIKE AND SUBSCRIBE FOR MORE CONTENT♡ COMMENT IF YOU LIKED THE VIDEO♡ Videos will be uploaded more frequently every week♡ Likes and subscribes will be so appreciated! ♡♡♡♡♡♡♡♡♡♡♡♡♡♡♡♡♡♡♡♡♡♡♡♡♡♡♡♡♡ Enjoy♡

body: I've been making Montages, mostly Ahri, i would love some feedback to make them better! Check it out if you can! Thank you x  https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=JLt3djcyhiQ

replies.body: Can't watch anything with that generic loud music, also disable the hud so it looks cleaner and nicer
lol those tower charms on point

Wow... I can tell you're very skilled with Ahri. Good job :D Definitely subbing for more :)

One thing you could work on is when editing the audio to the clips, try to sync the music with the video (i.e. a down-beat on a kill, or a crescendo just before an epic engage).

Also, could you tell me how you made your intro? I would love to use something similar in my videos :)

aww thank you, it means so much <33 i'll take your feedback thank you! 
I used http://velosofy.com/ to get a video template and edited it using After FX!
You can also just type on youtube 'youtube intro template', theres heaps of videos with different ones you could download and if you can edit them if you like with After FX!
